wifi: wil6210: debugfs: fix uninitialized variable use in `wil_write_file_wmi()`

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit 52b11a48cf073e0aab923ae809a765d756cecf13, it was introduced in version v5.4.211 by commit 60c9983425167ec5073c628d83a6875760d18059. For more details please see the references link.
summary: wifi: wil6210: debugfs: fix uninitialized variable use in `wil_write_file_wmi()`
